name: Zombie Shooter (itch) (RohanDev)
description:
The Plot

You are a soldier meant to complete the given task. You have to go through a horde of zombies, pass through shelters to complete the task.

 --------------------------------------------------------

Zombie shooter is created the help of assets. The main focus of mine is game design.

--------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

 [WASD] to Move

[L-Shift + WASD] to Sprint

[F]  Flashlight

 [SPACEBAR] to Jump

[Escape] Pause menu

[Left Mouse Button]  Shoot

[Right Mouse Button] Zoom

[Scroll] to change weapons

--------------------------------------------------------

If you found any bugs or want to suggest something fell free to comment or message me on discord at legendrohan1#1904
